definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: President Carter and his wife visit Yuelu Academy.
sentences.chinese: 卡特及夫人参观湖南大学岳麓书院。

sentences.english: Graduated from Hunan University, core young actor of Hunan drama group.
sentences.chinese: 湖南大学毕业，现为湖南省话剧团核心青年演员。

sentences.english: In China's mainland, he completed his undergraduATe work AT Hunan University.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，他于湖南大学完成了大学学业。

sentences.english: The first time of my life I stayed in the HuNan University.
sentences.chinese: 大学生涯的第一阶段，我是呆在湖南大学。

sentences.english: This article introduces the construction and development of library of Hunan University in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了湖南大学图书馆近几年建设与发展历程。

sentences.english: I will graduate from Hunan University.
I'm graduating from Hunan University in this July, and my major is tour.
sentences.chinese: 我今年六月从湖南大学毕业，我的专业是旅游。

sentences.english: Furthermore, a systematic architecture design for Hunan University digital campus is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 最后对湖南大学数字化校园建设进行了系统架构设计。
